Technical Data
****************
Spanish Multilanguage Incl | Free | 8.9 MB | Setup & Portable | Windows 2000/XP/2003 Server/Vista/7/8

Description
*************
CDBurnerXP is a free application to burn CDs and DVDs, including Blu-Ray and HD-DVDs. Also includes the feature to burn and create ISOs. It's Multilanguage. Everyone, even companies, can use it freely. It is a free software adware, or other malicious components.

Key Features
-----------------------------
Create CD / DVD data
*************************
Burn any kind of data in CD-R/CD-RW/DVD + R / DVD-R / DVD + RW / DVD-RW / DVD-RAM / BD / HD-DVD, including double layer mediums
Supports data burning on permanent backup M-Discs, que promise up to 1000 years of data preservation.
Burn MP3 CDs to store many audio files on one disc
Create bootable discs
Disc spanning: Spread data on multiple discs
Automatic verification of recorded data after burning process
To add files, use the internal browser or drag and drop them directly into the drop box from any Windows Explorer window
Save your compilations to create backup
Record on the fly and disk failure protection
Amount old sessions (ISO 9660) and edit existing file structure on CD / DVD
Disk Erase quick or full
Copy data discs (possible protection of data is avoided)
view disc information and recorder

Create audio CDs
*******************
Create Audio-CDs from the Following formats: MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, WMA, APE, MPC, WV (WavPack)
Add one or multiple tracks to your new compilation directly from audio CDs without ripping tracks before (add cda files)
Play audio files with integrated audio player
Supports playback of audio CDs without slow mode (disc-at-once)
Import M3U or WPL playlists or Nero audio compilations (NRA)
Support for ReplayGain
support for CD-Text
Import lists CUE
Export audio compilations as M3U playlist and Cue sheet
Create mixed-mode discs

Features ISO
*********************
Burn ISO files to CD
Create your own ISO files
Convert files. Bin and. Nrg to ISO
Store CDs / DVDs as ISO files on any disk

Other Features
**********************
Simple cover printing and data discs audio discs
LightScribe Integration
Command Line Version
Supports most IDE, USB, Firewire and SCSI
Integrated option to enable access to restricted user device
Multilanguage interface
Updated online

Recent Changes
******************
4.5.2.4214 changes:
Added feature miniature print
Verification added to video DVDs, updated to v15 StarBurnX
Standard message boxes are shown below RTL language if required
It also shows cover images embedded audio files to print thumbnails
Fixed incorrect date / time covering disk file
